* Iron Raptor had dropped the willow branch when she had seen Prowl's expression, she was surprised to see that Zenyak had come to and had then damaged Prowl.
She had transformed into her robot mode just as Prowl had thrown the attacked into a near by tree but was glad to see that Zenyak had passed out.
Iron Raptor then turned her attention back to the one who really needed it now, Prowl.
She walked up to him but then went behind and looked at the bleeding wound in his right shoulder, she put a hand on his shoulder but placed her second just beside the wound. With her thumb she wiped the mech fluid away just to get a glimpse of the damage before more fluid replaced the old, it wasn't too bad but if it wasn't treated then it could bleed half of Prowl's fluid reserves dry.
Iron Raptor then looked around and spotted something that could help clot the fluid and thus slow the bleeding, the tree was near and she just reached over and grabbed a fist full of moss and then applied it to Prowl's wound. Due to the wetness of the fluid the moss stayed there and began to soak up the liquid.
She had heard Prowl's question and looked up from his wound to answer.*

" Yes, I can. But I want you in a CR chamber as soon as you get that bot in holding, alright?"

* She pressed a little on the moss to make it stay a little more but then took her hands away from Prowl, she stood back and looked at the natural bandage. It would do until Prowl got back to base.*
